        Returns:

      • saveSelectedStopName

        private boolean saveSelectedStopName(Context context,
                                     java.lang.String selectedStopName)
        Save the currently-selected stop name to shared preferences.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        selectedStopName - Name of the stop to save to shared preferences.
        Returns:
        Successfully saved.

      • stopForecastTimeout

        private void stopForecastTimeout(AppWidgetManager appWidgetManager,
                                 int widgetId,
                                 RemoteViews views,
                                 int timeoutTimeMillis)
        Set up timeout for stop forecast, which clears the stop forecast and displays a holding message after a set period. This is a necessary evil due to their currently being no way for a widget to know when it is "active" or "visible to the user". This implementation is in order to not hammer the battery and network.
        Parameters:
        appWidgetManager - AppWidgetManager.
        widgetId - App widget ID.
        views - RemoteViews.
        timeoutTimeMillis - The period (ms) after which the stop forecast should be considered expired and cleared.

      • loadListSelectedStops

        private java.util.List<java.lang.CharSequence> loadListSelectedStops(Context context)
        Load list of user-selected stops from file.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        Returns:
        List of user-selected stops.

        private void updateStopForecast(Context context,
                                RemoteViews views,
                                StopForecast stopForecast)
        Update the current stop forecast with newer information from the server.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        stopForecast - Latest stop forecast from server.
